mapper.update: /*kr.go.bai.eip.aep.afu.dao.DCMACM017EMapper.update601BCOR*/ UPDATE TBCORCOR601B SET REQ_DVSN_CD = #{reqDvsnCd} /*청구구분코드*/ , ACP_STEP_CD = #{acpStepCd} /*청구단계코드*/ , ACP_STEP_NM = #{acpStepNm} /*청구단계명*/ , NECES_YN = #{necesYn} /*필수여부*/ , STAD_DT = #{stadDt} /*기준일*/ , TSK_DESC = #{tskDesc} /*업무설명*/ , LINK_URL = #{linkUrl} /*링크주소*/ , SORT_SNO = #{sortSno} /*정렬순번*/ , FNL_USR_ID = #{usrId} /*최종사용자ID*/ , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD = #{dptCd} /*최종거래부서코드*/ , FNL_MNU_ID = #{menuNo} /*최종메뉴ID*/ , FNL_MDF_DH = SYSDATE /*최종수정일시*/ WHERE REQ_DVSN_CD = #{reqDvsnCd} AND ACP_STEP_CD = #{acpStepCd}

/*kr.go.bai.eip.aep.afu.dao.DCMACM017EMapper.update601BDCP*/ UPDATE TBDCPDCP601B SET REQ_DVSN_CD = #{reqDvsnCd} /*청구구분코드*/ , ACP_STEP_CD = #{acpStepCd} /*청구단계코드*/ , ACP_STEP_NM = #{acpStepNm} /*청구단계명*/ , NECES_YN = #{necesYn} /*필수여부*/ , STAD_DT = #{stadDt} /*기준일*/ , TSK_DESC = #{tskDesc} /*업무설명*/ , LINK_URL = #{linkUrl} /*링크주소*/ , SORT_SNO = #{sortSno} /*정렬순번*/ , FNL_USR_ID = #{usrId} /*최종사용자ID*/ , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD = #{dptCd} /*최종거래부서코드*/ , FNL_MNU_ID = #{menuNo} /*최종메뉴ID*/ , FNL_MDF_DH = SYSDATE /*최종수정일시*/ WHERE REQ_DVSN_CD = #{reqDvsnCd} AND ACP_STEP_CD = #{acpStepCd}

/*kr.go.bai.eip.aep.afu.dao.DCMACM017EMapper.update602BCOR*/ UPDATE TBCORCOR602B SET ACP_MAIN_SEQ_W = #{acpMainSeqW} /*가로주요업무순서*/ , ACP_MAIN_SEQ_H = #{acpMainSeqH} /*세로주요업무순서*/ , ACP_MAIN_STEP_NM = #{acpMainStepNm} /*주요업무명*/ , ACP_DOC_CD = #{acpDocCd} /*문서ID*/ , CMPT_YN = #{cmptYn} /*완료여부*/ , LINK_TYPE = #{linkType} /*링크유형*/ , LINK_URL = #{linkUrl} /*링크주소*/ , FNL_USR_ID = #{usrId} /*최종사용자ID*/ , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD = #{dptCd} /*최종거래부서코드*/ , FNL_MNU_ID = #{menuNo} /*최종메뉴ID*/ , FNL_MDF_DH = SYSDATE /*최종수정일시*/ WHERE REQ_DVSN_CD = #{reqDvsnCd} AND ACP_MAIN_STEP_ID = #{acpMainStepId} AND ACP_STEP_CD = #{acpStepCd}

/*kr.go.bai.eip.aep.afu.dao.DCMACM017EMapper.update602BDCP*/ UPDATE TBDCPDCP602B SET ACP_MAIN_SEQ_W = #{acpMainSeqW} /*가로주요업무순서*/ , ACP_MAIN_SEQ_H = #{acpMainSeqH} /*세로주요업무순서*/ , ACP_MAIN_STEP_NM = #{acpMainStepNm} /*주요업무명*/ , ACP_DOC_CD = #{acpDocCd} /*문서ID*/ , CMPT_YN = #{cmptYn} /*완료여부*/ , LINK_TYPE = #{linkType} /*링크유형*/ , LINK_URL = #{linkUrl} /*링크주소*/ , FNL_USR_ID = #{usrId} /*최종사용자ID*/ , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD = #{dptCd} /*최종거래부서코드*/ , FNL_MNU_ID = #{menuNo} /*최종메뉴ID*/ , FNL_MDF_DH = SYSDATE /*최종수정일시*/ WHERE REQ_DVSN_CD = #{reqDvsnCd} AND ACP_MAIN_STEP_ID = #{acpMainStepId} AND ACP_STEP_CD = #{acpStepCd}
